name: Top Banana (itch)
description:
Made by Mark Oldham and Toby Price.

Shoot and swing from your web by clicking and holding LMB. Drag while holding and release to launch the object you're attached to in the direction you dragged, as well as yourself!

You can press R to restart, and you would think Escape would let you leave this mess, but guess again!

Warning: Annoying audio glitch in level 4!
